tool_description: climate change news Around the world
name: climate-change-news-77
title: climate-change-news-77

api_list.name: Get Individual Climate Change  news
api_list.description: Get Individual Climate Change  news from a particular source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news-77.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news-77.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
